addon.property:
Text Module can be used for gap filling activities.
  1. A dropdown gap: {{1:option 1|option 2|option 3}}.
  2. An editable or a draggable gap: \gap{answer}.
  3. A gap with 2 correct options: \gap{blue|navy}.
  4. This is a filled gap: \filledGap{initial text|answer}
The Text Selection addon allows marking / selecting parts of text as \correct{correct} and \wrong{wrong} phrases.
ENGLISH O NEVER E E W
donkey pigeon zebra swan dolphin duck seagull tiger

property.name: blockName

item.property: text1.setText("Answer for first question was choosen")

addon.property: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <block type="vfc_source_module" id="tMdBe8:E|Urxc_*KPD[;" x="-2" y="217"> <field name="ID">Choice1</field><value name="event"> <block type="vfc_choice_event" id="IVKgeQDZSk0t+KOPf:PM"> <field name="id"></field> <field name="selection">-1</field> <field name="score">1</field> <statement name="action"> <block type="vfc_feedback_module" id="^!Vid*:CCQ9FT@$etadx"> <field name="id">Image1</field> <statement name="action"> <block type="vfc_show" id="s*0aH@T.`/%``XS7w4v{"></block> </statement> </block> </statement> </block> </value> </block> </xml>
The addon allows marking relevant parts of text with different colors, e.g. you can color all verbs present in the text \color{red}{red} and all nouns \color{blue}{blue}.
